name: WestCAT: Paratransit
description: Door-to-door transit in western Contra Costa County
fullDescription: WestCAT provides ADA paratransit service for western Contra Costa County residents who cannot use regular bus service due to a disability.
whatTheyOffer:
- Door-to-door shared ride service
- Service in western Contra Costa (Pinole, Hercules, Rodeo, Crockett)
- Advance reservations required
- Wheelchair accessible vehicles
howToGetIt:
1. Complete the paratransit eligibility application
2. Application at westcat.org
3. Assessment may be required
4. Once certified, schedule rides by phone
keywords: WestCAT, paratransit, ADA, Pinole, Hercules, Rodeo, Crockett, Contra Costa, disability, wheelchair
